meanings.definition: A soft paper tissue used for wiping the nose or mouth.
meanings.sent1: I always keep a box of kleenexes in my bag for when I have a runny nose.
meanings.sent2: She reached for a kleenex to wipe away her tears.
meanings.sent3: The sneezing panda grabbed a kleenex to blow its nose.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a comforting kleenex, wiping away his worries.
meanings.sent5: The softness of the kleenex against her skin was a gentle touch of comfort.

meanings.definition: A brand of disposable paper tissues.
meanings.sent1: Mom asked me to buy kleenexes from the store for the guests.
meanings.sent2: She prefers using kleenexes over other tissue brands.
meanings.sent3: The kleenexes were stacked neatly on the shelf, waiting to be used.
meanings.sent4: The box of kleenexes was like a beacon of relief during flu season.
meanings.sent5: The colorful packaging of the kleenexes brightened up the room.
